meanings.definition: The quality of being unapproachable or inaccessible.
meanings.sent1: Her unapproachability made it hard to ask her for help.
meanings.sent2: The unapproachability of the mountain peak made it a challenge for climbers.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unapproachability was comical as it sat on the highest shelf, out of reach.
meanings.sent4: His unapproachability was like a fortress, keeping everyone at a distance.
meanings.sent5: The unapproachability of the castle on the hill was both impressive and intimidating.

meanings.definition: The state of being difficult or impossible to reach or contact.
meanings.sent1: The unapproachability of the customer service department frustrated many callers.
meanings.sent2: Due to the unapproachability of the island, few dared to venture there.
meanings.sent3: The unapproachability of the vending machine led to creative ways of trying to get snacks out.
meanings.sent4: The unapproachability of the star athlete made him seem almost untouchable.
meanings.sent5: The unapproachability of the ancient ruins added to their mysterious allure.
